    Subscription.prototype.add = function (subscription) {

        //  1. the subscription is null
        //  2. we're attempting to add our this

            return;

            case 'function':

            case 'object':

                    break;
                }

                    sub.unsubscribe();
                }

                }
                break;
            default:
                throw new Error('Unrecognized subscription ' + subscription + ' added to Subscription.');
        }
    };
